articles.title: Druzhba pipeline leak cuts oil flow to Germany, accident blamed - Reuters
articles.description: Poland said on Wednesday a leak in one of the Druzhba pipelines bringing oil from Russia to Europe hit supplies to Germany and was most likely caused by an accident, as Europe remains on high alert over its energy security.
articles.content: WARSAW, Oct 12 (Reuters) - Poland said on Wednesday a leak in one of the Druzhba pipelines bringing oil from Russia to Europe hit supplies to Germany and was most likely caused by an accident, as Eur… [+4075 chars]

articles.author: Esther Webber, Hannah Brenton, Eleni Courea
articles.title: Liz Truss panics as markets keep plunging - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: In spite of her U-turns, the current market unease may be out of Truss’ hands.
articles.content:
LONDON Try as she might, Liz Truss just can't calm the markets.
Despite reversing her plan to cut tax for the highest earners, bringing forward a more detailed budget statement by almost a month and… [+5997 chars]
